thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Blackstone Benefits From Buoyant Markets, Tax Changes

author: Miriam Gottfried
title: Blackstone Benefits From Buoyant Markets, Tax Changes
text:
Blackstone Group LP reported strong fourth-quarter results as buoyant markets and new tax legislation boosted the value of its holdings.
The private-equity firmâ€™s economic profit, which reflects changes in the value of unrealized investments, rose to $850.4 million, or 71 cents a share, from $811.6 million, or 68 cents a share, a year earlier. That beat the 67-cent consensus estimate of analysts polled by FactSet.
Still,...
